column1: Faizpur is a city and a municipal council in Yawal taluka in Jalgaon district in the state of Maharashtra
Faizpur is located at 21.17°N 75.85°E﻿ / 21.17; 75.85. It has an average elevation of 226 metres (741 feet).

column3: 602. Males constitute 52% of the population and females 48%. Faizpur has an average literacy rate of 85.96%
column4: higher than the national average of 74.04 : male literacy is 89.45%
column5: and female literacy is 82.28%. In Faizpur
column6: 13% of the population is under 6 years of age.

column1: The first rural (and 51st national) conference of Indian National Congress was held in Faizpur in 1936
column2: Pandit Nehru was President and Rajmal Lalwani was the treasurer for that conference.

column1: List of presidents of municipal council — Khushalbhau Chaudhari
